title: Targeted grazing reduces a widespread wetland plant invader with minimal nutrient impacts, yet native community recovery is limited
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 362

Author(s): Christine B. Rohal, Brittany Duncan, Jennifer Follstad Shah, Kari E. Veblen, Karin M. Kettenring
